Author: MottledAndGrey
Text: omg yesssss “wish I could just be alone with my ED until i’m... done” is so fucking specifically accurate. like i just wish i could put every other aspect of my life on hold and “work on” starving? even though i have success and love in other aspects of life and I should get satisfaction from that but....???????

Author: LowCalPal
Text: >I keep telling myself that I’ll be able to do whatever I want when I’m skinny/pretty enough and that it will all be worth it in the end but I know that I’ll never get to the point where I’m happy with myself.  I'm literally married and living what should be my dream life, and I still tell myself this, still find myself wishing I could just be alone with my ED until I'm...done.  or something.  But like, **done?!** Be alone with it to what end? Why?  What's it going to get me that I haven't done a better job of getting for myself already?  Augh fuck you brain.
